metadata.title: CVE-2022-29622 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** An arbitrary file upload vulnerability in formidable v3.1.4allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted filename. NOTE:some third parties dispute this issue because the product has common usecases in which uploading arbitrary files is the desired behavior. Also,there are configuration options in all versions that can change the defaultbehavior of how files are handled. Strapi does not consider this to be avalid vulnerability.

criterions.comment: node-formidable package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
